hero.title: OUR PHILOSOPHY
hero.description: True value doesn't come from appearance but from integrity. WAU believes that minimalist design and quality materials create timeless pieces that enhance your space.
hero.subtitle: Between food and art, between Japan and Ukraine

pastItems.item1: Designs based on historical principles and traditional crafting techniques
pastItems.item3: Focus on natural materials and texture
pastItems.item6: Limited batch production to ensure quality control

presentItems.item1: Integration of modern technologies with traditional craft
presentItems.item4: Utilizing sustainable materials that remain durable
presentItems.item6: Creating timeless pieces that transcend trends
presentItems.item7: Building collaborations with clients to fully actualize and conceptualize custom works

products.title: WAU FOOD
products.quote: INTERIOR DESIGN IS AS MUCH ABOUT WHAT YOU DON'T PUT INSIDE A SPACE AS WHAT YOU PUT IN.
products.furnitureDescription: Working with furniture focused on clean lines and contextual design. Exploration of negative space, form, and function. Using natural wood, steel, and textiles to craft pieces that stand the test of time and evoke tranquility in spaces.
